verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On his way to a contentious summit in Canada Friday morning] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: questioned] [ARG1: the decision to kick Russia out of the G-8] .
On his way to a contentious summit in Canada Friday morning , President Donald Trump questioned the decision to [V: kick] [ARG1: Russia] [ARG2: out of the G-8] .
